channel.title: Server Only Connects to One Client
channel.description:
First off, I have very little java experience so please be detailed in explanations.
I have googled and searched on the forums but I can't find where I can change it. This source only works on 1 client and it is anti-leech. So if anyone can help me find where to change and how, that would be appreciated. Please no haters this is serious, sorry if it's obvious.

item.title: Server Only Connects to One Client
item.dc:creator: @Valzor Valzor
item.description:
@Valzor wrote:

public int loadgame(String playerName, String playerPass) { for (Integer bUid : server.bannedUid) { if (uid == bUid.intValue()) { return 4; } }

Read full topic
